summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1709, for the improvement of Twenty-fourth Avenue, in The City of Seattle, from East Cherry Street to the south line of J. H. Rengstorff's Addition to The City of Seattle, by constructing a sewer therein of proper dimensions and materials, with all wyes, openings, flush tanks, manholes, catch basins and other appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, under Ordinance No. 18144 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
